CustomField.formula: CASE(Account.Organization_Type__c, "DC-Distributor Customer", "Utility", "ED-Encompass Program Distributor", "Flow", "FE-Flow End Customer","Flow", "FM-Skid Manufacturer/OEM", "Flow", "HA-Flow House Account", "Flow", "IR-Flow Industrial/Commercial Rep", "Flow", "OD-Flow Open Distribution", "Flow", "TD-Turf Distributor", "Flow", "UC-Utility Customer", "Utility", "UD-Utility Distributor", "Utility", "UO-Utility Other", "Utility", "WD-WYCO Distributor", "Flow", "WE-WYCO End Customer/Contractor", "Flow", "WM-WYCO OEM", "Flow", "None")
CustomField.label: Business Unit
